name: All Lucky Sweet Candy Dessert Casino Mania Slots - Slot Machine with Black-jack and Bonus Prize-Wheel
name_original: All Lucky Sweet Candy Dessert Casino Mania Slots - Slot Machine with Black-jack and Bonus Prize-Wheel
description:
All Lucky Sweet Candy Dessert Casino Mania Slots is an awesome and fun 3 line slot machine with an amazing candy dessert theme twist to it. Now available on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch.

FEATURES:

- Blackjack on the sweet cream tables
- Bonus prize wheels for more credits and prizes
- Game Center Leaderboard

NOTE:

All Lucky Sweet Candy Dessert Casino Mania Slots - Slot Machine with Black-jack and Bonus Prize-Wheel is a slot simulator for entertainment use only. It is free to play, and you can choose to purchase an unlock payout with in-app transactions. No real money or any other real world goods and/or services can be won in this game.
